dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 809 IH: Fighting for Orange-Stricken Territories in the Eastern Region Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ross introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify presumptions of service-connection relating to the exposure to herbicides of certain veterans who served in the Armed Forces during the Vietnam Era, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fighting for Orange-Stricken Territories in the Eastern Region Act.

section.header: Clarification of presumptions of service-connection for veterans exposed to certain herbicides while serving in the Armed Forces during the Vietnam Era

subsection.text: Section 1116 of title 38, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:
In this section, the term Republic of Vietnam includes each of the following:

paragraph.text: The territorial seas of the Republic of Vietnam.

subsection.text: Section 1710(e)(4) of such title is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking subsection— and inserting subsection:; and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: The term Republic of Vietnam has the meaning given such term in section 1116(g) of this title.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsections (a) and (b) shall take effect as of September 25, 1985.
